definition: qilin (mythical Chinese animal)/kylin/Chinese unicorn/commonly mistranslated as giraffe
see 麒麟閣|麒麟阁[Qi2 lin2 Ge2]
eucheuma, a type of red algae (used in TCM)
Qilin Pavilion, located in the Weiyang Palace, a hall decorated with portraits of famous officials

sentences.english: Each ace of kylin daredevil gathered in the interview venue.
sentences.chinese: 各家好手齊聚的麒麟藝高的面試會場。

sentences.english: The cluster lies 2600 light-years from Earth in the constellation of Monoceros.
sentences.chinese: 這棵“樹”實際是距離地球2600光年的麒麟星座。

sentences.english: and field daisies in my hands .
sentences.chinese: 手裏拿着野雛菊和麒麟黃。

sentences.english: Phoenix is not CHEUNG, Kirin not swim.
The xuan President let enterprise separate kylin daredevil to go abroad.
sentences.chinese: 玄會長讓振國分開麒麟藝高去留學。

sentences.english: The giraffe grown in Africa was mistaken for the Qilin (Chinese unicorn)in the Ming Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 明代將非洲產的長頸鹿比附爲麒麟。

sentences.english: Remain kylin to fight bravely in an isolated force in this block battlefield.
sentences.chinese: 剩下麒麟在這個街區戰場中孤軍奮戰。

sentences.english: This situation lasts till some day when a kylin appears suddenly.
sentences.chinese: 這種狀態一直維持到某天一隻上古麒麟的突然闖入。

sentences.english: The news spread to spark an 'Eucheuma-rush'.
sentences.chinese: 這個消息傳了出去，引發了一場“麒麟菜熱”。

sentences.english: These two sacred animals are often used as decorative figures in Miao embroidery .
sentences.chinese: 牛龍和麒麟，則是苗族刺繡中常見的裝飾圖案。

sentences.english: As one sits astride a black unicorn.
It is Kylin TV's wish to contribute to the work of spreading traditional Chinese culture around the world.
sentences.chinese: 麒麟電視希望在弘揚中華文化上盡一些綿薄之力。

sentences.english: And the group of research and development of kylin game however draw over the elite inside the industry.
sentences.chinese: 而麒麟遊戲的研發團隊卻籠絡了行業內的精英。

sentences.english: Due to our advantage on technology, education program will be more suitable to be broadcasted at Kylin TV.
sentences.chinese: 麒麟平臺的技術優勢非常適合打造教育類節目平臺。

sentences.english: Objective To prepare low molecular weight Eucheuma striatum sulfated polysaccharides.
sentences.chinese: 目的製備相對低分子質量異枝麒麟菜硫酸多糖。

sentences.english: When the sun finally dipped beneath the waves, the Daimyo presented himself to the Kirin, and was instantly dissolved into water.
sentences.chinese: 當太陽落下海面，大名走向麒麟，並隨後溶解於水中。

definition: Azure Dragon, one of the four symbols of the Chinese constellations, also known as the Azure Dragon of the East 東方青龍|东方青龙[Dong1 fang1 Qing1 long2] or 東方蒼龍|东方苍龙[Dong1 fang1 Cang1 long2]/(slang) man without pubic hair
Black Tortoise (the seven mansions of the north sky)/(in Daoism) God of the north sky
White Tiger (the seven mansions of the west sky)/(slang) hairless female genitalia
Vermilion Bird (the seven mansions of the south sky)
celestial horse (mythology)/fine horse/Ferghana horse/(western mythology) Pegasus
Fenghuang county in Xiangxi Tujia and Miao autonomous prefecture 湘西土家族苗族自治州[Xiang1 xi1 Tu3 jia1 zu2 Miao2 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1]
Bai Ze or White Marsh, legendary creature of ancient China

four divinities/four divine emperors/four mythical creatures symbolic of prosperity and longevity, namely the phoenix 鳳|凤[feng4], turtle 龜|龟[gui1], dragon 龍|龙[long2] and Chinese unicorn 麒麟[qi2 lin2]/also 四象[si4 xiang4], the four division of the sky
